configWindow.title: Settings
configWindow.language.label: Language
configWindow.dagMode.description: Determines how nodes are positioned based on their hierarchy.
configWindow.dagLevelDistance.description: Sets the spacing between each hierarchical level in the graph(0 - 100).
configWindow.system.description: Select the Brazilian Jiu-Jitsu systems you want to load into the visualization. Each activated system will add its positions and transitions to the main graph.

touch.title: Use touch gestures to navigate the scene
touch.text2: Swipe with two fingers: Pan view
touch.text3: Pinch with two fingers: Zoom in/out

desk.title: Use the mouse to navigate the scene

nodeView.title: Video Player
nodeView.subTitle: View and analyze the video content below.
nodeView.brandSubTitle: Define the start and end points for specific video segments.

nodeConnectionViewer.sourceLinksLabel: This node has no outgoing connections.
nodeConnectionViewer.targetLinksLabel: This node has no incoming connections.
